summary: Add and remove patches from baseline
description: Adds and removes patches from a baseline.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Describes the clientId or mspId of the tenant

parameters.name: baselineId
parameters.description: Unique Identifier (UUID) of the baseline patch

parameters.name: patchId
parameters.description: Unique Identifier (UUID) of the patch applied

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: System defined action for patch baselining
